record.dc:title: 21MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Features #3 and #5.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Profile section at 55' line embraced by foundations of house-structure (Feature #3). At left extreme of profile is the cross-section; of the longitudinal section, of the southwest posthole trench. Likewise on the extreme right is a cross-section of the northeast trench. The house floor (Feature #5) is indicated in the fireplace of fired clay-more truly a fire-basin. View taken from the south. From Notes: Weather -- cloudy. Adjustment -- f 32, 1 second. Subject -- 55' Profile embraced by walls of Feature #3 en bloc. Feature #5 (tramped floor) shows. Also show(ing) is the Feature #7 (fire-basin). Camera position -- 100' line.
